org.springframework.integration.dsl.core

Class MessagingGatewaySpec<S extends MessagingGatewaySpec<S,G>,G extends org.springframework.integration.gateway.MessagingGatewaySupport>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.dsl.core.IntegrationComponentSpec<S,G>
      • org.springframework.integration.dsl.core.MessagingGatewaySpec<S,G>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the target MessagingGatewaySpec implementation type.
    G - the target MessagingGatewaySupport implementation type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean<G>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmqpBaseInboundGatewaySpec, BaseHttpInboundEndpointSpec, JmsInboundGatewaySpec

    public abstract class MessagingGatewaySpec<S extends MessagingGatewaySpec<S,G>,G extends org.springframework.integration.gateway.MessagingGatewaySupport>
extends IntegrationComponentSpec<S,G>
    An IntegrationComponentSpec for MessagingGatewaySupports.
    Author:
    Artem Bilan
